translations: 计算；用数字表示；修琢（figure 的 ing 形式）

phrs.translation: 解决；算出；想出；理解；断定
n. 长者；父亲般的人物；领袖
[美口]指望；[英口]打算；料想；把…估计在内
动作人物；可动人型；玩具人；活动人

sentences.sentence: It was so much fun figuring out where to put the openings for the spout and handle!
sentences.translation: 要弄明白在哪儿给壶嘴和把手开个口，这事真是太有趣了！

sentences.sentence: California is leading the way, as it does on so many climate efforts, in figuring out the details.
sentences.translation: 就像在许多气候问题上的举措一样，加州一如既往在处理细节问题方面遥遥领先。

sentences.sentence: Figuring himself a franchising whiz, Katz got into gyms, executive recruiting, dentistry, hair salons and cosmetics.
sentences.translation: 自视为特许经营奇才的 Katz 进入健身房，主管招聘，牙科，美发沙龙和化妆品行业。
